publisher.value: WHO Nomenclature Committee for Factors of the HLA System

description.value:
The IPD-IMGT/HLA Database provides a specialist database for sequences of the human major histocompatibility complex (MHC) and includes the official sequences named by the WHO Nomenclature Committee For Factors of the HLA System. The IPD-IMGT/HLA Database is part of the international ImMunoGeneTics project (IMGT).
The IPD and IMGT/HLA database is described in the following publications.
Robinson J, Halliwell JA, Hayhurst JD, Flicek P, Parham P, Marsh SGE: The IPD and IMGT/HLA database: allele variant databases. Nucleic Acids Research (2014) 43 Suppl 1:D423-31 <https://doi.org/10.1093/nar/gku1161>
Robinson J, Malik A, Parham P, Bodmer JG, Marsh SGE: IMGT/HLA - a sequence database for the human major histocompatibility complex Tissue Antigens (2000), 55:280-287 <https://doi.org/10.1034/j.1399-0039.2000.550314.x>
